data.convo: I'd have a look at some pots and pans . We've got several kinds . All are made of different materials . What kind is most durable , please ? Well , here is one made of duralumin . That's cheap and durable . Over there we've also got some made of stainless steel , and those over there are enamel ones . I'll have the stainless ones . They look very solid . Yes , sir . Stainless steel products are always popular .
